
### instruction prefixes

* REX (64-bit and/or extra register bits)
* VEX (SSE/AVX instructions; other new instrs.)
* operand/address-size change (64/32 to 16 or vice-versa)
* <code>LOCK</code> --- synchronization between processors
* [<code>REPNE/REPNZ/REP/REPE/REPZ</code> --- turns instruction into loop]{.fragment fragment-index=2 .custom .myem-only}
* segment overrides
